title: Mental Model-Based Instructional Design for Solving Learning Challenges in Management Information Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business theory and comprehension of information systems concepts
context.additional_context: Diagnostic assessment of prior knowledge gaps in digital-enabled environments with personalized adaptive feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can represent their mental models of core concepts in management information systems as visual cognitive maps.
Learners can analyze gaps in conceptual understanding and derive improvement strategies by comparing peer cognitive maps.
Learners can collaborate with instructors to identify personalized learning challenges and develop customized learning plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
